api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dotnetschool.p.rapidapi.com/customer/a1b2c3d4-e5f6-g7h8-i9j0-k1l2m3n4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dotnetschool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dotnetschool.p.rapidapi.com/customer/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dotnetschool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
